summary: pigs shedding was the highest in co-inoculated and co-inoculated pigs. a significant increase in Hps titre in the lung was found only in co-inoculated pigs. SIV increased the severity of lung lesions and facilitated Hps (PIWetHps192/2015) replication in the porcine lung. Enhanced Hps and SIV replication contributed to a more severe clinical signs.
